text: Moshe "Mooky" Joseph Greidinger is an Israeli businessman and the CEO of Cineworld, a major cinema chain. Along with his brother, he owns 29% of the company. Mooky comes from a family with a long history in the cinema business, dating back to the 1930s. He joined his father's cinema business in 1976 and later expanded it globally. However, the COVID-19 pandemic caused significant challenges for Cineworld, leading to financial difficulties and the company filing for bankruptcy protection in 2022. == References == Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:1952 births Category:Living people
title: Mooky Greidinger
